korean: 한 편 보면 다음 편이 궁금해서 멈출 수가 없었어.
밥 먹을 때도 보고 누워서도 봤다.
시즌 전체를 다 봤더니 허무하면서도 뿌듯하다.
english: I binge-watched a Netflix series all weekend.
After watching one episode, I was curious about the next and couldn't stop.
I watched while eating and even while lying down.
After finishing the entire season, I feel both empty and satisfied.
